message: Let's start with a fair-ish offer. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can always adjust later.
Let's be a bit more equitable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the inflation that will affect you more in the coming rounds.
Okay, I'm willing to budge a bit. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor.  Inflation is still a concern, but I want to keep things moving.
